Summary

Details

Method
Details

A menu topic sub-item can be used to represent an item in a MenuTopicItem’s list of display items. This can be useful when displaying a topic must trigger a side-effect.

class MenuTopicSubItem :   object

getItemText

(none)

Methods  

getItemText ( )

menusys.t[465]

Get the item’s text. By default, we just return an empty string. This should be overridden to return the appropriate text, and can also trigger any desired side-effects. Adv3Lite Library Reference Manual
